wobani.material

Class MaterialSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.material.MaterialSlot

  • public class MaterialSlot
extends java.lang.Object
    The Material's slot. It can store a color, parameters, a 2D and a CubeMapTexture, the texture's tiling and offset. All of them are optional but in some cases you should fill some values. For example if you use the MaterialSlot as a normal map, you should set a texture, shaders can't do anything with a single color as a normal map.

      Texture coordinates' offset along U and V directions.
      private org.joml.Vector2f textureTile
      Texture's tile factor along U and V directions.
      static ParameterKey<java.lang.Float> USE_GLOSSINESS
      Determines whether the shader use the specular map's or the specular color's alpha channel as a glossiness value.
      static ParameterKey<java.lang.Float> USE_POM
      Determines whether the shader use the normal map's alpha channel as a parallax map.

public org.joml.Vector2f getTextureTile()
